content: पृषत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पृस्-अतच् किच्च] Spotted. --तः {@--1@} The spotted antelope. {@--2@} A drop of water; पृषतैरपां शमयता च रजः <ls>Ki. 6. 27</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 3</ls>; <ls n="R.">4. 27</ls>; <ls n="R.">6. 51.</ls> {@--3@} A spot, mark. {@--4@} An antelope considered as the vehicle of Vāyu.
